title: Learn Laravel in 2025
metaDesc: A complete guide to Laravel in 2025 with routing, controllers, Blade templates, and Eloquent ORM.
content:
Laravel is a modern PHP framework that makes web development elegant and developer-friendly. It follows the MVC (Model-View-Controller) pattern.

Why Laravel?

  • Beautiful syntax and developer experience.
  • Comes with authentication, routing, sessions, and caching out of the box.
  • Powerful Eloquent ORM for database handling.

Basic Route Example

Route::get('/welcome', function () { return view('welcome'); });
“Laravel is not only a framework, it's a way of writing clean PHP.”

Learn more at the Laravel Docs.
